channel.title: passwordless on Cino
channel.description: Recent content in passwordless on Cino

item.title: Using password(les)s in 2023
item.description: It’s been almost a year since I’ve started using my YubiKey, even though I only recently bought a backup key (yes, you can shame me) I decided it is time to have big write up on why you should be using a hardware key with Fido2(WebAuthn) support too.
